If attack value odd, attack value += 1
If attack value even, next defence value += 1
Add 5 damage whenever type token used
If you slay an enemy, add 1d4 to your next attack
On dealing damage, return a used type token
Add 1 damage for consecutive attacks on same opponent
If roll minimum on attack die, can reroll once (per combat)
If you successfully defend an attack, deal 1 damage to enemy

Add defense die to attacks if attacking at long range
